name: Pachi-Slot Monogatari: PAL Kougyou Special
overview: Pachi-Slot Monogatari: PAL Kougyou Special ("Pachi-Slot Story: PAL Industry Special") is a pachi-slot game and the follow-up to the 1994 KAZe/KSS game Pachi-Slot Monogatari: Universal Special. As with that game, it focuses on the machines produced by a single pachi-slot machine manufacturer. It also features the same two modes: a story mode that has the player moving from place to place to earn money at pachi-slots and converse with NPcs, and a "lesson" mode that also includes "quiz" and "battle" options.
